thread.title: EastEnders spoilers Kim discovers that Phil is the father of Denise's baby? | Metro News
thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers Kim discovers that Phil is the father of Denise's baby? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: EastEnders spoilers Kim discovers that Phil is the father of Denise's baby? | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news duncan lindsay for metro.co.uk

text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 21 Feb 2017 12:02 am (Picture: BBC) 
It’s not the best kept secret in EastEnders but there are still plenty of people who don’t know that Phil Mitchell fathered the baby that Denise Fox recently gave up for adoption – including her sister Kim. But that could be about to change when Kim reaches a startling conclusion – is it the right one, though? 
After Denise lets slip to Kim that the father now knows his link to the baby, Kim desperately pushes her for more information. However they are interrupted when Patrick, Shirley and Carmel turn up to throw Denise a surprise lunch to cheer her up after trouble she has with the area manager at work. 
Kim isn’t giving up though and when Shirley and Denise gets drunk, Kim watches closely and realises Shirley knows who the father is and she implies that he is local. (Picture: BBC) 
After everyone leaves, Kim continues to pester Denise until she snaps but the next night, during Ian Beale’s birthday party, Kim talks with Carmel over the identity of the baby’s dad and everything seems to slip into place. (Picture: BBC) 
As Kim reaches a shocking conclusion, has she discovered the truth about Phil or will her suspicions fall elsewhere? 
One to watch: Friday 3rd March at 8pm on BBC One. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
